column2: "Na Aaron tseen ne nsa wɔ Egypt nsu do; na ntwɛr no fowee bae
"Na akɔmfo no dze hɔn nkaber no yɛɛ dɛmara
column3: na wɔmaa ntwɛr fowee baa Egypt asaase do."

column4: Hom mpa EWURADZE kyɛw ma onyi ntwɛr no mfi emi
column5: nye me man do; na mebɛma ɔman no akɔ

column3: W’adaworom: ebɛn aber na mempa kyɛw memma ɔwo
column4: nye wo nkowaa
column6: ma wɔnsɛɛ ntwɛr no mfi ɔwo nye w’efi do
column7: na wɔnka esutsen no nko mu?"

column4: Ɔnyɛ dɛ dza aka no ara: ama eehu dɛ obiara nnyi hɔ a ɔtse dɛ EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn."
nye wo nkowaa
column5: nye wo man do; esutsen no mu nko na wɔbɛka."

column2: "Na Moses nye Aaron fii Farao nkyɛn kɔree: na Moses sui frɛɛ EWURADZE wɔ ntwɛr no a ɔdze baa Farao do no ho."
"Na EWURADZE yɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ Moses kae no: na ntwɛr no wuwui wɔ efi mu
column4: nye haban mu."

column2: "Na wɔboaboaa hɔn ano ekuwekuw: na asaase no do bɔnee."
"Na Farao hun dɛ ahotɔ aba mu no
column4: na oenntsie hɔn: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE kae no."
Tsen wo poma no
column5: na fa bɔ asaase do huntuma
column6: ma ɔndan dwuw wɔ Egypt asaase nyinara do."

column2: "Na wɔyɛɛ dɛm; na Aaron dze no poma no tseen ne nsa
column3: na ɔdze bɔɔ asaase do huntuma
column4: ma dwuw fɔɔr nyimpa nye mbowa: asaase no do huntuma nyinara daan dwuw wɔ Egypt asaase nyinara do."

column2: "Na akɔmfo no dze hɔn nkaber yɛɛ dɛmara dɛ wɔrema dwuw aba na woenntum: na dwuw no wɔ nyimpa nye mbowa ho."

column3: Nyankopɔn nsatseaba nye yi: na Farao n’akoma pirimii
column4: na oenntsie hɔn; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE kae no."
na kegyina Farao enyim; hwɛ
column5: ɔreba nsu no ho; na se no dɛ

column2: "Na sɛ ennkɛma me man akɔ a
column4: mebɛma atsɛn menyamenya aba ɔwo
column7: nye w’efi do: na Egyptfo efiefi mu
column8: na asaase a wɔtse do no so atsɛn menyamenya bɛyɛ no amaama."

column2: "Na da no mubotwa Gosen asaase a me man tse do no egya
column4: ama eehu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE wɔ asaase finimfin."

column2: "Na medze ɔhe mobɔto me man nye wo man ntamu: ɔkyena na asɛnkyerɛdze yi bɛba."
"Na EWURADZE yɛɛ dɛm; na atsɛn menyamenya a hɔn ano yɛ yaw baa Farao fi mu
column3: nye no nkowaa efi mu: na osian atsɛn menyamenya no ntsi Egypt asaase no nyinara do sɛɛe."

column4: Hom nkɔ nkɔbɔ afɔr mma hom Nyankopɔn wɔ asaase no do."

column3: Ɔnnsɛ dɛ wɔyɛ no dɛm; osiandɛ Egyptfo ekyiwadze na yɛdze bɔbɔ afɔr ama EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn no: hwɛ
column4: ana yɛmfa Egyptfo ekyiwadze mbɔ afɔr wɔ hɔn enyiwa mu
column5: na wonnkesiw hɛn abo bi a?"

column2: "Yebotu ndaansa kwan akɔ sar no do
column3: na yɛakɔbɔ afɔr ama EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn
column4: dɛ mbrɛ ɔbɛhyɛ hɛn no."
ama hom aakɔbɔ afɔr ama EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn no wɔ sar no do; na ekyir nko na hom nnkɔ: hom mpa kyɛw mma me."
mirifi wo nkyɛn akɔ
column5: na makɛpa EWURADZE kyɛw ma atsɛn menyamenya no eefi Farao
column7: nye ne man do ɔkyena: na abrasɛm nko na mma Farao nndzi bio
column8: dɛ ɔnnkɛma ɔman no akɔ akɔbɔ afɔr ama EWURADZE."

column2: "Na EWURADZE yɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ Moses kae no; na oyii atsɛn menyamenya no fii Farao
column4: nye ne man do; kor mpo annka."
